attributes.action: Allow Special Constables to have 21 days paid 'time off' work as a Public Duty, like the Terretorial Army
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At Present there is no obligation for a company to provide time off work for Special Constables to perform their duty.
Many companies continue to pay their staff who volunteer for the Terretorial Army. We believe Special Constables should be given similiar allowances in regards to the time they commit to their country and not be forced to use Holiday Allowance.
Specials provide a valuable service to the country and have the same powers as a regular Police Officer. They could vastly increase Police presents and help enforce Neighbourhood Policing if given the time they deserve
